clinical_study.brief_title: a Trial of Using SMS Reminder Among Diabetic Retinopathy Patients in Rural China
clinical_study.official_title: a Randomized Controlled Trail to Determine the Impact of a SMS Reminder Among Diabetic Retinopathy Patients in Rural China

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to use a randomized controlled design to determine the impact of a SMS messaging intervention on the following outcomes among persons diagnosed with diabetic retinopathy in rural China.

detailed_description.textblock: SMS message reminder is a system which can sent re-visit information to remind the patient about the revisit time and address. The investigators can use the SMS system to find out if it is a useful to reduce the not-attended rate of the revisit appointment among the rural diabetic retinopathy patients.

primary_outcome.description: Compare the SMS patient not-attended rate with the control group to show the impact of SMS reminder on the compliance with scheduled follow-up visit

secondary_outcome.measure: Knowledge about Diabetic retinopathy on a standardized examination
secondary_outcome.description: Using a questionnaire about the comprehensive eye exam and Diabetic retinopathy to compare Knowledge about Diabetic retinopathy on a standardized examination between the SMS group and the control group
Presenting vision(Best corrected visual acuity) in the better-seeing and worse-seeing eyes of the two group
Loss of presenting vision(Best corrected visual acuity) in better-seeing eye thought due to Diabetic retinopathy
Using a patient satisfaction questionnaire to compare satisfaction with care between the SMS group and the control group

arm_group.description: the diabetic retinopathy patient in the SMS group will receive a SMS reminder message about the revisit time,address 1 week and 3 day before the appointment.
the diabetic retinopathy patient in the control group won't get any reminder message before the appointment.

intervention.description: the SMS reminder message will sent to the SMS group patients 1 week and 3 day before there appointment,to remind them the exact time and address of the revisit appointment.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- all the diabetes patients who would like to join our study in 5 CREST cooperated rural hospitals.
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Both the patient and his/her caretakers don't have cellphone,or the one who has cellphone but don't know how to use the SMS function.
2. The first re-visit appointment time is outside our study period.
